snippet.title: Absolute Talent: Survival RPG - Official Trailer | Get It On Google Play
snippet.description:
Survive with your talents on a mysterious island full of violent tribes. We collect raw materials, quickly discover, build and prepare to fight back.

Description: In The Mysterious Island, we are a survivor, stranded on an island that’s unfortunately not desert. We collect raw materials and other necessary things and quickly discover that there are some really creepy dudes hiding in the bushes. Natives turn out to be hostile, so we need a shelter and increase chosen talent until absolute. We collect wood, stones, we build and prepare to fight back.

=====================
LINK DOWNLOAD: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gingersun.absolutetalent
=====================

Music by QubeSounds from Pixabay
